about_the_game:
ExoFrontier: Venus is a RogueVania with RPG elements and procedurally generated dungeons. You will never have to do the same level again and again, all upgrades are permanant, become stronger thanks to the RPG elements and the city building, and follow the story of Doug as you go deeper inside the dungeons!

  • Hostile Environment: Explore a mysterious planet and unearth ancient artifacts to unlock the secrets of Venus

  • Base Improvements: Improve Lumina, your home base by accomplishing quests and meet new folks

  • Procedurally Generated: Discover new maps configuration each time you enter in a dungeon

Story

Year 22XX, Earth is overpopulated and the planet Venus has become habitable. Doug, our protagonist, decides to go there and becomes an explorer. He'll be entrusted with dangerous missions in various little-explored parts of the planet.

Gameplay

  • Explore dangerous dungeons of the planet Venus with your explorer equipments

  • You can move, jump, fly with a jetpack, roll, backdash and attack with both a melee and a ranged weapon.

  • Face various enemies and find the exit of each level to go deeper into the dungeons.

  • You can improve Lumina, the main city, in order to attract more people in Venus, and obtain better equipments

Main Features

  • Micro-levels procedurally generated

  • 5 zones

  • 100+ items to collect

  • Strong RPG elements

  • Permanent upgrades for a constant and stable progression
